General_Description: '''War for the Sea''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Sparta|Our]] [[ship]]s are getting destroyed by [[Athens|Athenian]] vessels. Clear the sea for our ships.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra destroyed Athenian [[penteconter]]s and [[trireme]]s all over [[Greece]], as well as Athenian [[soldier]]s, and was rewarded for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
